summary: An ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to incur an indebtedness against the Water Fund on account of the cost and expense of the improvement of 11th Avenue Northeast, from East 78th Street to East 80th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 4349, and appropriating money therefor, as a loan to Capital Account.
